about_the_game:
Dive into an epic adventure to save the Galaxy in this action-packed co-op Looter Shooter and elevate your Rebel status with the Heroic Content Upgrade Pack!

Relic Hunters Legend Heroic Content Upgrade Pack includes:

· Exclusive Gold-themed skins for all five playable Hunters (Seven, Pinkyy, Jimmy, Ace, Raff)
· Exclusive Galaxy-themed skin for Seven
· Early Access Gold-themed player banner
· Digital Comic Book (120 Pages, available in English and Brazilian Portuguese)
· Emote bubble pack
· Exclusive Kami Hat accessory for all five playable Hunters

IMPORTANT: Heroic Content Upgrade Pack DOES NOT contain the base game – Relic Hunters Legend base game is required to use the Heroic Content Upgrade Pack.
